Method Detail

getAdminObject

public static org.openspaces.admin.Admin getAdminObject(String managementIP,
                                                        int expectedGsmCount,
                                                        Integer lusPort)
                                                 throws TimeoutException,
                                                        InterruptedException
Gets a "full" admin object. The function waits until all GridServiceManagers are found before returning the object.

Parameters:
managementIP - The IP of the management machine to connect to (through the default LUS port)
expectedGsmCount - The number of GridServiceManager objects that are expected to be found. Only when this number is reached, the admin object is considered loaded and can be returned
lusPort - port the lus is running on.
Returns:
An updated admin object
Throws:
TimeoutException - Indicates the timeout (default is 90 seconds) was reached before the admin object was fully loaded
InterruptedException - Indicated the thread was interrupted while waiting

executeSSHCommand

public static void executeSSHCommand(String host,
                                     String command,
                                     String username,
                                     String password,
                                     String keyFile,
                                     long timeout,
                                     TimeUnit unit)
                              throws TimeoutException
Executes a SSH command. An Ant BuildException is thrown in case of an error.

Parameters:
host - The host to run the command on
command - The command to execute
username - The name of the user executing the command
password - The password for the executing user, if used
keyFile - The key file, if used
timeout - The number of time-units to wait before throwing a TimeoutException
unit - The units (e.g. seconds)
Throws:
TimeoutException - Indicates the timeout was reached before the command completed

createInstallationDetails

public static InstallationDetails createInstallationDetails(MachineDetails md,
                                                            Cloud cloud,
                                                            ComputeTemplate template,
                                                            org.openspaces.admin.zone.config.ExactZonesConfig zones,
                                                            String lookupLocatorsString,
                                                            org.openspaces.admin.Admin admin,
                                                            boolean isManagement,
                                                            File cloudFile,
                                                            org.openspaces.admin.gsa.GSAReservationId reservationId,
                                                            String templateName,
                                                            String securityProfile,
                                                            String keystorePassword,
                                                            String authGroups,
                                                            boolean rebootstrapping)
                                                     throws FileNotFoundException
Creates an Agentless Installer's InstallationDetails input object from a machine details object returned from a provisioning implementation.

Parameters:
md - the machine details.
cloud - The cloud configuration.
template - the cloud template used for this machine.
zones - the zones that the new machine should start in.
lookupLocatorsString - the lookup locators string to pass to the new machine.
admin - an admin object, may be null.
isManagement - true if this machine will be installed as a cloudify controller, false otherwise.
cloudFile - the cloud file, required only when isManagement == true.
reservationId - A unique identifier of the new agent to be created
templateName - The template of the machines to be created
securityProfile - set security profile (nonsecure/secure/ssl)
keystorePassword - The password to the keystore set on the rest server
authGroups - The authentication groups attached to the GSA as an environment variable CloudifyConstants.GIGASPACES_AUTH_GROUPS
rebootstrapping -
Returns:
the installation details.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if a key file is specified and is not found.

public static int getFileTransferPort(CloudTemplateInstallerConfiguration installerConfiguration,

Parameters:
installerConfiguration - the installer configuration.
mode - the file transfer mode.
Returns:
the port.
